title: Equivalent resistance of two resistors in parallel

content.prompt: When two resistors having resistances R1 and R2 are connected in parallel, the equivalent resistance of the combination is 10 Ω. Which of the following statements about the resistances is true?

choices.label: Both R1 and R2 are greater than 10 Ω.
Both R1 and R2 are equal to 10 Ω.
Both R1 and R2 are less than 10 Ω.
The sum of R1 and R2 is 10 Ω.
One of the resistances is greater than 10 Ω, and the other is less than 10 Ω.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
